A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it. Not sure why people say they hated it. I am guessing they created the movie in their head before they went and they had it completely wrong. I loved the fact that Rey's parents were nobody and that we did not get a back story on Snoke. The plot of the story is about Rey\, Finn\, Poe\, and Kylo Ren. The action scenes were great and I enjoyed Mark Hamill showing he can really act.
